threads.title: 820-00165 can't install os
threads.message:
This board don't accept osx
always an error in picture.

When I boot from another USB osx it boot, but it suddenly shut down

threads.title: 820-00165 can't install os
threads.message:
So you cannot properly run any macOS, nor even through USB?
Try clean ME BIOS...
